poem:
{0}'s life has been the poem I would have writ
But I could not both live and utter it

Cerulean's blue
Emerald's green
{0} is the queen
Yes, {0} is the queen

I love {0},
{0} loves me.
How we met
is a mystery.

Buster, Sparkle, Newbie, Speedy
and then there's {0}, our smallest kitty.
One, two, three and four and five,
they're so frisky, so alive.

{0} is always right.
Get used to it.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Sugar is sweet
and {0} is too.

If I had a flower for every time I thought of {0},
I could walk in my garden forever.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
If I had a flower
{0}, I'd give it to you.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
When I dream at night,
{0}, I dream of you.
